publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6248 Gil Paterson: Beardmore Hotel Strikes Gold at Scottish Hotel Oscars—That the Parliament congratulates the Beardmore Hotel in Clydebank on being named the Scottish Business Hotel of the Year 2010; praises the staff and management at the hotel for all their hard work, and wishes them every success for the year ahead.
S3M-6248 Beardmore Hotel Strikes Gold at Scottish Hotel Oscars (lodged on 4 May 2010) Des McNulty*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Bill Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*

S3M-6248Gil Paterson:Beardmore Hotel Strikes Gold at Scottish Hotel Oscars—That the Parliament congratulates the Beardmore Hotel in Clydebank on being named the Scottish Business Hotel of the Year 2010; praises the staff and management at the hotel for all their hard work, and wishes them every success for the year ahead. Supported by: Des McNulty, Stuart McMillan, Bob Doris, Bill Wilson, Bill Kidd, Sandra White
S3M-6248 Beardmore Hotel Strikes Gold at Scottish Hotel Oscars (lodged on 4 May 2010) Jackie Baillie*
S3M-6248 Beardmore Hotel Strikes Gold at Scottish Hotel Oscars (lodged on 4 May 2010) Mary Scanlon*
